description: net: avoid unnecessary type assetion panic in timeout tests

messages.text:
Under what circumstances does this test fail?
I expected that Read always returns a net.Error.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On Tue, Feb 7, 2012 at 2:42 AM,  <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Under what circumstances does this test fail?

I think I saw a crash caused by TCPConn.Read returning *io.EOF
as an error instead of net.Error but the code is not written so and
I cannot repro ot now.  Well... it seems like a daydream.

> I expected that Read always returns a net.Error.

Will abandon.

subject: code review 5630054: net: avoid unnecessary type assetion panic in timeout tests
